info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:25PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Saratoga, southern Washington and north central Rensselaer Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 825 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mechanicville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mechanicville, Cambridge, Greenwich, Gates, Malta, Lee, Easton, Stillwater, Schuylerville, Victory, Deans Corners, Cossayuna, Center Falls, Grangerville, Willow Glen, Coons, Wayville, Middle Falls, North Cambridge and Mannings Cove. This includes Interstate 87 near exit 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for east central New York.
